projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When running the latest SDK build (6.1.0.v20170110083813) the following error is shown: 
{code:java}
[ERROR] :  ** BUILD FAILED **
[ERROR] :  The following build commands failed:
[ERROR] :  	CpResource Resources/app.js build/Products/Debug-iphoneos/buildtest.app/app.js
[ERROR] :  (1 failure)
{code}

*Steps to reproduce* 
1. Download the latest build (6.1.0.v20170110083813)
2. Launch Appcelerator studio 
3. Go to {{File}} -> {{New}} -> {{Mobile App Project}} 
4. Choose a Classic default project 
5. Enter Details and create app 
6. Go to the {{tiapp.xml}}
7. Set SDK to (6.1.0.v20170110083813)
8. Run app 

*+Expected Result+*
Application should run without any errors. 

*+Actual Result+*
Build error is shown. 

Note: error only occurs on iOS devices.

comments.body:
Verified, Using the latest SDK build (6.1.0.v20170110133045) build error is no longer shown. 
*Environment*
{code:java}

Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 6.1.0
iphone 6 plus (ios 9.3.4)
Operating System Name: Mac OS X El Capitan
Operating System Version: 10.11.6
Node.js Version: 4.6.0
npm: 4.2.8
Titanium SDK Version: 6.1.0.v20170110133045
Xcode: 8.2
Appcelerator Studio: 4.8.1.201612050850
{code}
